<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// except that it is more lightweight and can track the state of a loop through</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopstructure/#adc8650d6098e0949f6ecc6368c2ebb99">parseLoopStructure</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;&amp;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class is used to constrain loops to run within a given iteration space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The algorithm this class implements is given a Loop and a range &#91;Begin,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// End).  The algorithm then tries to break out a &quot;main loop&quot; out of the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it is given in a way that the &quot;main loop&quot; runs with the induction variable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in a subset of &#91;Begin, End).  The algorithm emits appropriate pre and post</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loops to run any remaining iterations.  The pre loop runs any iterations in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// which the induction variable is &lt; Begin, and the post loop runs any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// iterations in which the induction variable is &gt;= End.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopconstrainer"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopconstrainer/#a1267203588d084fe0a37dacd6cad5a70">LoopConstrainer</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculated subranges we restrict the iteration space of the main loop to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See the implementation of &#96;calculateSubRanges&#39; for more details on how</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these fields are computed.  &#96;LowLimit&#96; is std::nullopt if there is no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// restriction on low end of the restricted iteration space of the main loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;HighLimit&#96; is std::nullopt if there is no restriction on high end of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// restricted iteration space of the main loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopconstrainer/subranges"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopconstrainer/subranges">SubRanges</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopconstrainer/subranges/#a5190bd74b76c14aae3a9b1c1f0e472e9"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::optional&lt;const SCEV &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopconstrainer/subranges/#a5190bd74b76c14aae3a9b1c1f0e472e9">LowLimit</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopconstrainer/subranges/#a6eb6c21625224ade4752f78614fe28f0"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::optional&lt;const SCEV &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopconstrainer/subranges/#a6eb6c21625224ade4752f78614fe28f0">HighLimit</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The representation of a clone of the original loop we started out with.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ClonedLoop &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The cloned blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt; Blocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;Map&#96; maps values in the clonee into values in the cloned version</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> Map;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An instance of &#96;LoopStructure&#96; for the cloned loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loopstructure">LoopStructure</a> Structure;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Result of rewriting the range of a loop.  See changeIterationSpaceEnd for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// more details on what these fields mean.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">RewrittenRangeInfo &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PseudoExit = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitSelector = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;PHINode &#42;&gt; PHIValuesAtPseudoExit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;IndVarEnd = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RewrittenRangeInfo() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clone &#96;OriginalLoop&#39; and return the result in CLResult.  The IR after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// running &#96;cloneLoop&#39; is well formed except for the PHI nodes in CLResult --</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the PHI nodes say that there is an incoming edge from &#96;OriginalPreheader&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but there is no such edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> cloneLoop(ClonedLoop &amp;CLResult, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Tag) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the appropriate loop structure needed to describe a cloned copy of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;Original&#96;.  The clone is described by &#96;VM&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Loop &#42;createClonedLoopStructure(Loop &#42;Original, Loop &#42;Parent,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp;VM, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSubloop);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite the iteration space of the loop denoted by (LS, Preheader). The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iteration space of the rewritten loop ends at ExitLoopAt.  The start of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iteration space is not changed.  &#96;ExitLoopAt&#39; is assumed to be slt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;OriginalHeaderCount&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are iterations left to execute, control is made to jump to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;ContinuationBlock&#39;, otherwise they take the normal loop exit.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// returned &#96;RewrittenRangeInfo&#39; object is populated as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  .PseudoExit is a basic block that unconditionally branches to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      &#96;ContinuationBlock&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  .ExitSelector is a basic block that decides, on exit from the loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      whether to branch to the &quot;true&quot; exit or to &#96;PseudoExit&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  .PHIValuesAtPseudoExit are PHINodes in &#96;PseudoExit&#39; that compute the value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      for each PHINode in the loop header on taking the pseudo exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After changeIterationSpaceEnd, &#96;Preheader&#39; is no longer a legitimate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preheader because it is made to branch to the loop header only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conditionally.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RewrittenRangeInfo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  changeIterationSpaceEnd(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopStructure &amp;LS, BasicBlock &#42;Preheader,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          Value &#42;ExitLoopAt,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          BasicBlock &#42;ContinuationBlock) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The loop denoted by &#96;LS&#39; has &#96;OldPreheader&#39; as its preheader.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function creates a new preheader for &#96;LS&#39; and returns it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BasicBlock &#42;createPreheader(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopStructure &amp;LS, BasicBlock &#42;OldPreheader,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Tag) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;ContinuationBlockAndPreheader&#39; was the continuation block for some call to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;changeIterationSpaceEnd&#39; and is the preheader to the loop denoted by &#96;LS&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function rewrites the PHI nodes in &#96;LS.Header&#39; to start with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// correct value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> rewriteIncomingValuesForPHIs(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LoopStructure &amp;LS, BasicBlock &#42;ContinuationBlockAndPreheader,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopConstrainer::RewrittenRangeInfo &amp;RRI) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Even though we do not preserve any passes at this time, we at least need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// keep the parent loop structure consistent.  The &#96;LPPassManager&#39; seems to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// verify this after running a loop pass.  This function adds the list of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks denoted by BBs to this loops parent loop if required.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> addToParentLoopIfNeeded(ArrayRef&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt; BBs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some global state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Function &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LLVMContext &amp;Ctx;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Information about the original loop we started out with.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Loop &amp;OriginalLoop;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BasicBlock &#42;OriginalPreheader = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The preheader of the main loop.  This may or may not be different from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;OriginalPreheader&#39;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Type of the range we need to run the main loop in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Type &#42;RangeTy;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The structure of the main loop (see comment at the beginning of this class</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for a definition)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LoopStructure MainLoopStructure;</span></CodeLine>
